cu.explanation_en: GNB_PORT_FOR_X2C changed from 36422 to 0, which is out of valid port range (1-65535). This simulates an invalid port configuration that would cause connection failures in X2-C interface.
cu.explanation_zh: GNB_PORT_FOR_X2C 从 36422 更改为 0，超出有效端口范围 (1-65535)。这模拟了 X2-C 接口中会导致连接失败的无效端口配置。

du.explanation_en: pMax changed from 20 to -1000, which is far below the valid range for maximum transmit power. This simulates an invalid power configuration that would cause transmission failures.
du.explanation_zh: pMax 从 20 更改为 -1000，远低于最大发射功率的有效范围。这模拟了会导致发射失败的无效功率配置。
